title: Reasons for eating fast food in the U.S. as of August 2014
summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Convenient and lowest at Response Other.
The highest Response Convenient has 61.6 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Other.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Convenient and lowest at Response Other.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Convenient and lowest at Response Other.
The highest Response Convenient has 61.6 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Other.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 5 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Convenient and lowest at Response Other.
The highest Response Convenient has 61.6 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Other.
Share of respondents at Response Convenient is 67.2 , second place is Cheap at 31.7, and thirdly is I just like it at 30.6.
The Response Convenient tends to be 2.27 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Responses, we get total 148.3.
